100 noes with Dr. Nadia Brown

How many times do you have to do something you hateâ€¦ before you love it? For Dr. Nadia Brown, her journey to learning a skill she loathed started when the unthinkable happened and she was broke. She had to dig deep and learn to sell her services, but also learn to trust the people around her who believed she could be good at it.
